member.summary: Gets or sets the Opacity of Flyout when it is dragged.

member.name: T:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout
member.summary: Summary for Flyout entity

member.name: M:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.#ctor
member.summary: Initiates a flyout object with default values With default 200 open, delay and close time Positioned at bottom center and middle aligned Open at MouseOver, Close on MouseOut No flying or sliding effect Page color: #DDDDDD

member.name: M:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.getClientID
member.summary: Gets the client object name

member.name: M:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.getClientID(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the client object name for multiple IDs

member.name: M:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)
member.summary: Renders the Html markup for the flyout control

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.AttachTo
member.summary: Gets or sets ID of the element which Flyout will be attached to.

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.OpenEvent
member.summary: Gets or sets the open trigger of flyout

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.CloseEvent
member.summary: Gets or sets the open trigger of flyout

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.OpenTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time Flyout need to open. Default = 200

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.CloseTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the time Flyout need to open. Default = 200

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.Resolution
member.summary: Gets or sets resolution which is how many frame Flyout will draw when openning. The higher value the smoother. Default = 10.

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.RelativeLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets relative Left of Flyout to Left of AttachTo element when Position is ABSOLUTE.

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.RelativeTop
member.summary: Gets or sets relative Top of Flyout to Top of AttachTo element when Position is ABSOLUTE.

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.DelayTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the delay time which is how long FlyBox will wait before closing when user move mouse out of Flyout.

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.Position
member.summary: Gets or sets the built-in common used relative postion of Flyout to position of AttachTo element.

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.Align
member.summary: Gets or sets the Alignment with AttachTo element.

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.Opacity
member.summary: Gets or sets opacity. Default = 100;

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.PageOpacity
member.summary: Gets or sets opacity. Default = 25;

member.name: P:OboutInc.Flyout2.Flyout.PageColor
member.summary: Gets or sets opacity. Default = "#CCCCCC";
